documents.document: Why spend ur time trying to be someone else in order to get his attention? If he doesn't like u for who u are, he's not worth ur time.
Sometimes we just have to SMILE. Not because we're HAPPY, but because we need to find an escape from the PAIN we're in.
There will always be those days when the sky just isn't blue enough or when the clouds are too gray. Not everyday is gonna be happy.
If you have choices, choose the best. If you have no choice, do the best.
If you really love someone, I believe that there is nothing in the world that you can not overcome.
Don't feel sad over someone who gave up on you, feel sorry for them because they gave up on someone who would have never given up on them.
A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.
Let go of those who bring you down and surround yourself with those who bring out the best in you.
We can only live in TODAY: eat, love, pray, work, relax, and above all enjoy today. (´▽`)/
Sometimes there are many things that will make u give up on ur way on achieving ur dreams, but u gotta keep focus n never give up hope.
Dear God.. Thanks for this beautiful life and forgive me if I don't love it enough.
They ask me what I see in you and I smile, look down, and say nothing because I don't want them to fall in love with you too.
No matter how good of a person you are, there will always be someone criticizing you!
Long distance relationships will only work if you both trust one another and love one another. It won't be easy.
If they took you for granted, let them go, walk away and find someone better, someone you deserve, someone who treats you right.
It's amazing what prayer can do. It comforts you, makes you feel whole inside, and gives you hope.
No one will make a lock without a key. Similarly, God won't give problems without solutions.
God made you, then He made me, and then He whispered... "Meant to be".
To the world you could be one person, but to one person you could mean the world.
Don't count how many new friends you can make. Count how many old ones you can keep.
Mencintai bukanlah tentang memberikan yang terbaik dalam segala kelebihan, tetapi memberikan yang terbaik meski dalam kekurangan.
Don't be with someone because it's easy. Be with someone because you love them, even if it's difficult.
I can't find a reason why I like you, I just do. I can't find a reason why you should like me, it's up to you.
#note2boys A girl is in love with you when she realizes she's willing to do things for you she wouldn't do for anyone else.
Loving God when everything is easy, that's great. Still loving Him when nothing is easy, that's faith.
One of the best feelings ever in the world is when you're hugging someone you love really tight and he hugs you back even tighter.
The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
A love like ours isn't common. We treat each other with respect and we remain loyal because we only want to be with each other.
When I'm down, I remember that there is someone who will ALWAYS love me, and that is God.
I love you, I love you, I love you. Even if I say it a thousand times, it's not enough.
I am not a mind reader, but I can feel it when you are lying to me.
Dear God, thank you for all my blessings, my wonderful family, my healthy life, and thank you for what You have in store for my future.
Missing someone is a part of loving them. If you're never apart, you'll never really know how strong your love is.
Sometimes God pushes us to our limits, it's because He has greater faith in us than we have in ourselves.
I love you because you're the only one who fought for me and made me believe that I was worth it. Thank you for that.
GOD, MOM, DAD = People who will always support and love you no matter what.
Why do you choose to be sad when you can be happy? Remember, it's not what happens to you that matters, it's how you take it. Be positive!
A smile on your face is the best thing to see.
A person who truly loves you, will never let you go, no matter how hard the situation is.
A real boyfriend: Calls you for nothing, texts you all the time, wants to see you, cries, gets jealous, overprotective, and loves you.
Each time I miss u, a star falls down from the sky. So if u look up and find it dark, it is all ur fault. U made me miss u too much!
True love is about being with the person that makes you happy in a way that nobody else can.
Tall boy + Short Girl = Cute couple ^^
You should know that you are the only one who makes me laugh when I don't even want to smile.
Guys who kiss girls on the forehead are the sweetest and the most gentleman you can ever have.
God always has His best way for us, but sometimes we're too stubborn, we just want our own ways.
The past is where you learned the lesson. The future is where you apply the lesson. So don't give up in the middle, which is the present.
When some things go wrong, take a moment to be thankful for the things that still going right.
Sometimes the person who made you stronger, is also your greatest weakness.
Sometimes no girl believes she's truly beautiful until one guys comes along and make her feel like she is.
Once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
Girls always find things out, they might not say anything right away, but they know.
Girls want a guy who say I love you every night and proves it every day.
I need someone who won't give up on me, no matter how many times I mess up.
Self confidence is the most attractive quality a person can have. How can anyone see how awesome you are if you can't see it yourself?
The happiest couples never have the same character. They just have the best understanding of their differences.
I don't care how we met, I'm just happy we did.
You control your actions, God controls the results. Always put your best effort forward and God will reward you.
No matter who you are or what problems you face in your life, your life is worth living, not just surviving.
No one can ever understand love. It has its own reasons, its own answer, its own explanations. Maybe it was never meant to be understood.
I don't need a perfect person, I just need someone that can make me happy and complete my life perfectly.
God knows who belongs in your life and who doesn't. Trust and let go. Whoever is meant to be there, will still be there.
Don't lead someone on. If you like someone, then tell them. If you just want to be friends, then don't make them think they have a chance.
When yesterday is a disappointment & today isn't better.. Remember there's always a tomorrow, make it something to look forward to. Smile!
You can't force anyone to love you, but you can show them what they're missing out on.
You're always special and precious. Don't let anyone say you're not, because you are always precious in God's eyes.
There are over 7 billion people in this world. Don't let a single person to make you cry.
Sometimes I wish I had never met you because then I could go to bed at night not knowing there was someone like you out there.
DESTINY... it's when both are brought to the right place, at the same time, and for a perfect reason. That's Love!
In this world that full of peoples, why should we meet and fall in love with each other? Don't you think it is destiny?
Confusing shows up, when your head doesn't wanna know what your heart says.
Apapun yang akan kamu lakukan, sertakan Tuhan dalam hatimu. Karena Tuhan selalu ada di sisimu, ketika tak seorang pun ada untukmu.
Sometimes your heart sees what’s invisible to the eye.
Don't say "Why, God?" when He takes something from ur life, if u never say "Thank God" when He gives everything in ur life.
People say it's better to hear the truth than to hear lies. But once they know the truth, they wish they never knew. Funny.
Tak perlu kesempurnaan untuk bisa berbahagia. Karena bahagia sesungguhnya adalah ketika kamu melihat apapun secara sempurna.
It's easy to say "Have Faith" when you're fine. But when you're having a bunch of problems, you can't even can encourage yourself.
If you are brave enough to love, then you are strong enough to let go.
I make mistakes, I know I'm not perfect. That's why I'm thankful for the true friends who stick by me knowing how I am.
Most touching line said by a best friend: "When I die, don't come near my body, because my hand may not be able to wipe your tears anymore."
My prince doesn't ride on white horse. He isn't tall, dark, and handsome, but he is the best thing that has ever happened to me.
Remember the good times, be strong during the difficult times, love always, laugh often, and thank God every day.
It's easy to get discouraged and give up, but God wants us to be so full of hope that we just can't help but believe for the best.
Smile. It will make him so jealous to see you're happy without him.
You are loved for the way you are. Don't try to be different.
If you love someone, showing them is better than just telling. If you don't love them anymore, telling is better than showing
Love... What is love? Love is to love someone for who they are, who they were, and who they will be.
I truly respect the people who stay strong, even when they have every right to break down.
There are many things in this world you may run out of, but God's love is not one of them.
It's hard to explain something to a person who doesn't want to understand.
If you truly want to be with a person, listen to your heart and not all the voices from all the people around you.
If God gives me one more chance to love/forget you, I will choose to forget you, because once I love you, I can't forget you.
One of the bravest things ever are teardrops. Wanna know why? Cause tears are not afraid to fall even for the wrong reason.
No one comes with a "clear history" button, so you have to accept their past.
Making someone smile is probably one of the best feelings.
Some days you don't need words of wisdom or inspiration. Some days you just know you have to do what you have to do.
Don't complain and ask why it happened to you; just get over it and do your best to make sure it doesn't happen to you again.
Life may not always be as good as it should be, but it's never as bad as it could be.
The best things in life aren't material "things", they're moments, feelings, lessons, faith, emotions, discoveries, and truths.
Being hurt is something you can't stop from happening, but being miserable is always your choice.
